caseTitle: Ghulam Farid & another v. Sher Rehman (decd) thr. LRs.
tagline: Fraud vitiates every solemn transaction and Court of law shall, in no eventuality, endorse and perpetuate a fraud once it is proved to have been committed. Any transaction, which is the result of misrepresentation, is not protected on the ground of period of limitation.
